text: NRG Stadium is a football stadium in Houston, Texas. The NFL's Houston Texans play their home games here. It was called Reliant Stadium from 2002 until 2013. The stadium hosted WWE's WrestleMania 25 on April 5, 2009. On March 19, 2014, the stadium's name was changed to NRG Stadium, after NRG Energy, the parent company of Reliant Energy. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:National Football League venues Category:Sports in Houston Category:Buildings and structures in Houston Category:Sports buildings in Texas
title: NRG Stadium
